name: Short Stories
description: Can a computer write a short story that makes sense?
details: Generations from [GPT-2 XL](https://github.com/openai/gpt-2) and [GPT-3](https://openai.com/api/) with prompts taken from the [Reddit Writing Prompts](https://github.com/pytorch/fairseq/tree/master/examples/stories'>Reddit Writing Prompts) dataset.

name: New York Times
description: Fake News has been a big worry lately. Can you spot when our computer wrote the news article?
details: Generations from [GPT-2 XL](https://github.com/openai/gpt-2) and [GPT-3](https://openai.com/api/) with prompts taken from the [New York Times Corpus](https://catalog.ldc.upenn.edu/LDC2008T19).

name: Recipes
description: Can you tell if an AI could pass as a master chef?
details: Generations from [GPT-2 XL](https://github.com/openai/gpt-2) and [GPT-3](https://openai.com/api/) with prompts taken from the [Recipe1M+ Corpus](http://pic2recipe.csail.mit.edu/).
